name: Snake Gyllenhall: Ace Electrician
description:
RECCOMENDED: Play in fullscreen

Connect all coils in each level to complete the circuit and finish that job order.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • ESC to return to level select
  • M to toggle music

OSHA Warnings For Possible Causes of Death

  • Touching water and electricity at the same time
  • Extending entire body over a pit (you will fall)
  • Spike walls
  • Running into yourself
  • Eating too much bad food

It’s Snake Gyllenhall’s first day at work as a Certified Electrical Sssafety Worker. With his trusty hardhat and conductive body, he must join together the circuits to complete job orders. In this electrifying serpentine puzzler, survive the dangerous, ungrateful world of hard work and sacrifice. Explore the complex relationship between supervisor and wagesnake. 

You are: Snake Gyllenhall, Ace Electrician.

Credits

  • Cody Ethan Jordan - programming and design
  • Connie Reynolds - programming
  • Robert Gainey - writing and levels
  • Weston Woodard - the hard levels
  • Zach Falconer - artistic direction, charming protagonist sprite

Project files at https://github.com/Deal-With-the-Dev/Snake-Electrician
